name: CoreConnect Corporation
tag_list: hris, hrms, hr-for-small-business, human-resources-for-small-business, cost-effective, easy-to-implement
overview: CoreConnect bridges the HR services gap for small to mid-sized businesses, providing an online, easy-to-learn, highly accessible tool to lighten administrative overhead. Employees can log in to the application from anywhere they have an internet connection, check the holiday schedule, benefits, read company updates, change their personal information, or work on their employee goals/reviews. Managers can make changes to personnel information, approve/reject vacation or time off requests, review HR documentation, work on employee reviews, and run reports.
